author: Phil
content: Snopes.com finds nothing on “Did J P Morgan sink the Titanic”.

author: David Peate
content: The more interesting take is that it wasn’t the Titanic but really her sister ship the Olympic. This one has more credibility, there are pictures in which the number of port holes matches the Olympic, not the Titanic and the Olympic was damaged beyond practical repair before the Titanic sinking. Change a couple of name plates, sink the broken ship, claim the insurance, etc. Check it out https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Titanic_conspiracy_theories

author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Yes, it’s all true.

But did you also know that Soros is actually an island in the Ionean Sea, and that Jason and the Argonauts were working at the behest of a cabal of international financiers?

The maritime scheme goes deep. Do your research! ðŸ™‚
